company_overview.Name: Mirum Pharmaceuticals Inc
company_overview.Description: Mirum Pharmaceuticals, Inc., a biopharmaceutical company, is focused on the development and commercialization of an advanced line of novel therapies for debilitating liver diseases. The company is headquartered in Foster City, California.
company_overview.Address: 950 TOWER LANE, SUITE 1050, FOSTER CITY, CA, US
